mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_band_spec.select */ SELECT band_id /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */ ,guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(256) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_band_spec WHERE 1 = 1 AND band_id = #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */ AND guar_tel_no = #{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(256) */
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_band_spec.update */ UPDATE ts_band_spec
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND band_id = #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */ AND guar_tel_no = #{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(256) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_band_spec.merge */ INSERT INTO ts_band_spec ( band_id /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */ guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(256) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */ #{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(256) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_band_spec.delete */ DELETE FROM ts_band_spec WHERE 1 = 1 AND band_id = #{bandId} /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(20) */ AND guar_tel_no = #{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(256) */
